name: Rock Thrower Stream Games
description:
Español -

Basicamente es un juego donde el streamer esquiva objetos que el chat le tira con comandos a través del chat.

English -

Basically its a game where as a streamer you dodge stones that the chat throws to you via commands in chat (sorry for the bad translation, hope its understandable).

All assets are from the Free Assets Store of Unity.

Todos los Assets son sacados de la tienda gratuita de assets de Unity.

pequeño clip de un streamer probando el juego  - HSaHigherPower |
